sentences.en: After an uncontested divorce, Peggy married Charlie.
sentences.cn: 和平离婚之后，佩姬嫁给了查利。

sentences.en: Are you satisfied with the election results of your constituency, including those candidates elected uncontested?
sentences.cn: 你满唔满意自己所属选区既选举结果, 包括无须投票而自动当选者?

sentences.en: However, this is only one account, and by no means an uncontested one.
sentences.cn: 然而这仅仅是一种理由, 而且绝非毫无争议.

sentences.en: Inflammation is not uncontested as a theory of aging. There are many competing hypotheses.
sentences.cn: 炎症理论作为有关老化的理论并非毫无争议的, 相反存在许多对立的假说.

sentences.en: Invincible uncontested top dog fencing, swordsmanship no one can break, and his life was lonely.
sentences.cn: 独孤求败剑术无敌, 剑法无人能破, 他的一生是孤寂的.

sentences.en: These claims have not gone uncontested .
sentences.cn: 这些说法并非无人提出异议。

words.tran_cn: 无竞争的；无异议的；无争议的

trans.tran_cn: 没有人争的，无竞争的，无异议的
trans.tran_en: an uncontested action or statement is one that no one opposes or disagrees with
